title: New: Vaults – Premonitions
body:
**Vaults** caused quite a stir last year with their stunning debut outing, _Cry No More_, an emotionally fraught, electro-pop beauty, showcasing a real depth of sound, as well as the potential to be real chart-worries.

As well as announcing details of their debut live show (15 May, The Courtyard Theatre, London – sold out already, sorry!), the trio are set to release their debut single proper through National Anthem on 9 June. _Premonitions_ is delicately poised, yet hard-hitting, owing as much to recent success story London Grammar as it does to Björk. Check it out below.
